subclassFeature.name: The Bitch With Many Teeth
entries: You swore allegiance to the hungriest of all hated gods - to the Bitch With Many Teeth. Many are afraid of her gifts - mouth full of razor sharp teeth is not as fancy as beauty granted by the Queen of Mirrors or endless rebirth from the womb of All-Mother.
They see her as nothing more but a hungry beast. But you? You know the truth.
You know there is nothing more powerful than love, nothing more beautiful than unity of two souls, when the two become one.
Singing serenades under the moonlight or expensive gifts or wild animalistic fuck are nothing more than a lie, born by this world of fakes.
Watered down, sanitized substitutes for true feelings.
Love isn't about holding hands.
Love isn't about saying fancy lies to each other.
Love isn't about support.
Love is all about power.
Love is all about the predator and her prey.
Love is all about Hunger.
There is a reason, after all, why even those pathetic poets always talk about unity of hearts.

entries.subclassFeature: Expanded Spell List|Warlock|PHB|The Bitch With Many Teeth|ALTBWMT|1

subclassFeature.name: Ravenous
entries: At 1st level, your teeth start growing out of control. You can bite when making an unarmed attack and can use your Dexterity for the attacks and damage rolls of your bite attack. Your bite attacks deal {@damage 1d6} Piercing damage and automatically deal maximum damage against targets that do not wear armour. Also, you can safely eat anything, be it flesh, bones or even stone. Having enough time, you can eat your way through the wall of the mightiest fortress. You still need something to drink, though.
You are immune to any ill effects of poison you ingest.

subclassFeature.name: Expanded Spell List
entries: The Bitch With Many Teeth lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

entries.caption: The Bitch With Many Teeth Expanded Spells
rows: {@spell blood of the lady serpent|ALTBWMT}, {@spell hunger|ALTBWMT}
{@spell gift of the bitch with many teeth|ALTBWMT}

subclassFeature.name: Devourer of Souls
entries: Starting at 6th level, you can devour not only flesh, but the very soul of your prey. Your bite attacks deal additional {@damage 1d6} Psychic Damage.

When you eat brain of a creature, you get some of the memories that your prey had. You may ask GM up to five questions that your dinner may have known answers for and they must answer truthfully. If he refuses for whatever reasons, keep punching their lying face until he has no teeth left.
If you eat the whole body of a creature, you destroy its soul. This creature cannot be resurrected by any means. No magic, no Gods and even no GM intervention can help your prey now. Delicious.

subclassFeature.name: Feast
entries: Starting at 10th level, when you devour a brain of a sentient being that never meant you any harm, you regain all of your Warlock spell slots.

subclassFeature.name: Belly of the Beast
entries: Starting at 14h level, when you make a bite Attack against a creature you are Grappling and it hits, the target takes the bite's damage, it is swallowed and the grapple ends.
While swallowed, the creature is Blinded and Restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other Effects outside of your belly, and it takes 4d6 Acid damage at the start of each of your turns.

If you take 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, you must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10' of you. If you die, a swallowed creature is no longer Restrained by it and can easily escape your corpse.

optionalfeature.name: The Serpent's Tongue
entries: {@b Prerequisite:} The Bitch With Many Teeth patron.
Your gaping maw is the only thing you need to weave magic. When casting a Warlock spell, you need only verbal component to cast any spell.
Once you use this invocation, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Predator
entries: {@b Prerequisite:} The Bitch With Many Teeth patron.
You can feel the scent of walk-meat from miles away. You can smell living creatures within 600 ft. of you, within 6 miles (31680 ft.) if they are bleeding.
You have an advantage on Perception and Survival checks to find them.

optionalfeature.name: Sword swallower
entries: {@b Prerequisite:} level 3, The Bitch With Many Teeth patron.
Who needs bags of holding if you got a bottomless belly? Your stomach can hold up to 500 pounds, not exceeding volume of 16 cubic feet.

Don't forget about acid, though. Items that were in your belly for more than 8 hours have 1 in 10 chance of being destroyed and this chance goes up with each subsequent hour. Even magical items are not safe.

optionalfeature.name: Lust for Flesh
entries: {@b Prerequisite:} level 5, The Bitch With Many Teeth patron.

Intoxicating smell of fresh blood makes your mouth wet. When you make a Bite attack against a living creature that has less than half of its maximum HP, you deal an extra {@damage 1d6} of Piercing damage.

optionalfeature.name: I am the living bread that came down from Heaven
entries: {@b Prerequisite:} level 7, The Bitch With Many Teeth patron.
As an act of great benevolence, you share your flesh and your blood with up to six other sentient beings. This feast takes at least an hour and counts as a long rest for other participants.
You gain no benefits for doing so and take {@damage 8d8} damage that can't be reduced by any means.
If a creature ingests your flesh every day for a week, it becomes addicted. If it tries to eat any other food, it must pass a DC 20 Constitution save or throw up in disgust.
Addiction can be cured, if a creature spends a full month without your flesh, but most of them will die of starvation way sooner.

optionalfeature.name: Hypnotising Gaze
entries: {@b Prerequisite:} level 9, The Bitch With Many Teeth patron.
Like a lady-serpent of ancient myths, you can paralyze people with your gaze full of love and soothing sweet voice.

If you talk with a non-hostile sentient being for at least a minute and have maintained direct eye contact for the whole time, they must pass a Charisma saving throw against your spellcasting DC or be Charmed by you as long as they can hear you clearly.
Even if you rip their beating heart out of their chest.

spell.name: Detect life
entries: Using this spell, you can detect living creatures within 60 ft. of you. Creatures in a coma, trance, suspended animation, or even masked by a false death spell can be detected by this spell.
The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

spell.name: Hunger
entries: All creatures within 30 ft. of you must pass a Charisma saving throw or get the {@condition Poisoned} condition until they take at least one action to eat something.

spell.name: Blood of the Lady Serpent
entries: You assume the form of the Lady-Serpent, your legs turn into a beautiful tail and your eyes become even more hypnotizing.
Your size is now Large, if your Strength was less than 19 it's 19 now and you have access to the following actions for the duration of the spell:

items: {@b Hypnotize:} one man within 6' of you must pass a Charisma saving throw or be Paralyzed until the end of your next turn.

{@b Constrict:} melee weapon attack, reach 10', one creature. Hit: {@damage 2d8 + 4} bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled}. Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and you can't constrict another target.

spell.name: Gift of the Bitch With Many Teeth
entries: One living sentient being within 30 ft. of you receives a gift of your patron.

If the target is a man, he must make a Constitution save, immediately take 66 damage that cannot be reduced by any means on a failed save, or 36 on a success. The spell then ends. If he dies, his head fucking explodes and his soul goes to the realm of the Bitch With Many Teeth. He cannot be resurrected by any means and it's sacrilege to feed on his corpse - he's not your prey. He belongs to Her now.
Men know nothing about love and don't deserve Her gifts.
If the target is a woman, she can make Bite attacks just like you do for the duration of the spell.
